metadata.title: CVE-2020-16600 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Use After Free vulnerability exists in Artifex Software, Inc. MuPDFlibrary 1.17.0-rc1 and earlier when a valid page was followed by a pagewith invalid pixmap dimensions, causing bander - a static - to point topreviously freed memory instead of a newband_writer.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
